title.narrative: Rural Development: Southern Punjab Poverty Alleviation Project

description.narrative: The project objective is to increase the incomes of the target population by enhancing their employment potentials and by increasing agricultural productivity and production.The project's policy and institutional objectives are to: (i) strengthen the cadre of community service providers at the local level; (ii) enhance the capacity of government agencies at various tiers for better service delivery to rural households; and (iii) generate knowledge that can be used to influence future investment decisions and policy-making on agricultural, livestock and rural development initiatives at both local and provincial levels.

name.narrative: Rural Development: Southern Punjab Poverty Alleviation Project

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
